document_data.caption: A beholder enjoying a suit of armor.
document_data.name: ''Beholder armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Beholder armor''''' was an odd kind of magical device used by [[beholder]]s to walk around.
document_data.Description: The ''armor'' was very closely resembled ''[[full plate mail]] +1'' used by [[humanoid]]s, but was built specifically for beholders to use. The beholder rested on a seat of sorts atop the shoulders, and was tied in securely with straps and buckles.
document_data.Powers: ''Beholder armor'' was used by beholders that wished to have a more "hands on" experience in combat. Once attached it allowed the beholder to walk about at a quick pace and use both [[gauntlet]] hands to hold items or weapons in addition to their typical beholderish abilities.
